alert.note: Alert for DeSoto (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 22 at 9:30AM EDT until September 26 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... Peace River At Arcadia at SR 70 affecting DeSoto County. .Recent heavy rainfall has caused water levels to rise on the Peace River. For the Peace...including Bartow, Zolfo Springs at SR 17, Arcadia at SR 70...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Peace River at Arcadia at SR 70. * WHEN...From late tonight to early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Access roads to river acres become flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM EDT Friday the stage was 10.4 feet. - Bankfull stage is 10.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 11.5 feet early Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Monday evening. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.5 feet on 06/03/1982. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (8 am EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Tue Wed Peace River Arcadia at SR 7 11.0 10.4 Fri 8 am 11.1 11.5 11.2 10.7 10.3 &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight by 1200 AM EDT.
